comments:

When I try to do a bug search using the Search view and switch to the Task tab, it says there are no available repositories, and the Repository combo box is empty.  When I go to Manage Configuration > Features and switch back to 2.0M1 (Replace With > Another Version), everything is working fine again.

Sorry, I just realized that I'd done an update on the Mylar Task List feature to M2, but my Mylar Bugzilla Connector and Mylar Focused UI features were still at M1 level.  Once I updated those two features to the latest, everything is working fine now.  Sorry for the false alarm.

David: did you use "Search for updates to the currently installed features" when installing?  That update manager feature is broken (bug 132450) so we state on our update page not to use it on the download page, but I still wonder how many people hit this regularly.
Yes, that's how I encountered the problem.  I guess doing the "search" only finds the update to the one feature.
Marking as duplicate of that Platform bug.  Please consider voting for it.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 132450 ***
voting for this one, or for bug 132450?
Please vote for bug 132450, since this one is marked resolved.
